info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.summary: Loading default values into a new FormEntity.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.FormEntity.description:
Definition and configuration of a Form
<para />
Carrier object for FormEntity.
Services for the FormEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMarketingAgent">Marketing Agent</see>.

FormKey.description: A short string used as unique id to access this form

Config.description: The JSON-formatted config of this form

FolderId.description: The folder which this form belongs to. -1 indicates that the shipment is on the root

ScriptId.description: The CRMScript Macro which will be run when the form is submitted.

ResponseShipmentId.description: The id of the s_shipment that is used to send the response mails

Active.description: Indicates if this form is active or not

Expires.description: After this datetime, the form will become inactive

MaxSubmits.description: After this number of submits, the form will become inactive

Type.description: What kind of form is this? Indicates if this is a normal form or a template

Recipe.description: The JSON-formatted recipe of this form

GroupId.description: The group which this form belongs to.

NewTicket.description: Indicates if this form creates a ticket or not

RecaptchaMode.description: What is the state of the recaptcha configuration? This is a read-only member

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

EmailFlows.description: EmailFlows this form is used in (read-only)

FolderName.description: The name of the folder for this form

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Marketing.description: VerifyGoogleRecaptcha: This method will try to verify a Google recaptcha token. The token is gained from the recaptcha frontend component

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.FormSubmissionE.description:
Content of a Form submission
<para />
Carrier object for FormSubmissionEntity.
Services for the FormSubmissionEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMarketingAgent">Marketing Agent</see>.

FormId.description: The id of the parent form.

ContactId.description: The optional id of the contact of the person who submitted.

PersonId.description: The optional id of the person who submitted.

EmailAddress.description: The email address of the person who submitted

ResponseShipmentAddrId.description: The id of the s_shipment_addr that is the response mail

Response.description: The JSON-formatted response from this form

Status.description: What is the status of this submission

ProcessingLog.description: A log of what happened during processing

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Marketing.description: CalculateMailingStatistics: Calculate open and click rates for one or more mailings
GetFormSubmissionsCount: Get counnt of submissions for given form and status. Count for all forms is returned if negative formId is given
GetPreviewMailing: Get a shipment message from its shipment address id

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreviewMailing.description:
A shipment message with information about the recipient it was sent to.
<para />
Carrier object for PreviewMailing.
Services for the PreviewMailing Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMarketingAgent">Marketing Agent</see>.

SendingTime.description: Estimated or actual sent time (depends on status)

Status.description: Status for sending to this particular recipient

FromAddress.description: Email address to put in the From header of the messages

Configuration.description: This field indicates what kind of shipment this is.

PersonFullName.description: Get the persons full name (internal name used in clients for employees).

MessageSubject.description: The mail subject field of the message

DocumentMessageId.description: If a document was used as the message this is the document ID.

Opened.description: Date/time the customer read the mailing.

LinkClicks.description: The number of links clicked in the mailing.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Marketing.description: GetPreviewMailingHeader: Get a shipment from its shipment id

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreviewMailingH.description:
A shipment with information intended for previewing it.
<para />
Carrier object for PreviewMailingHeader.
Services for the PreviewMailingHeader Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMarketingAgent">Marketing Agent</see>.

StartDate.description: The date and time when to start this shipment

FromAddress.description: Email address to put in the From header of the messages

Configuration.description: This field indicates what kind of shipment this is.

PersonFullName.description: Get the persons full name (internal name used in clients for employees).

MessageSubject.description: The mail subject field of the message

DocumentMessageId.description: If a document was used as the message this is the document ID.

NumSent.description: Number of emails sent at the current time.

NumOpened.description: Number of recipients that opened the email.

NumBounced.description: Number of recipients that resulted in a bounce.

NumClicks.description: Number of recipients that clicked at least 1 link in the mailing.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ShipmentMessage.description:
This entity contains information about design blocks that can be used in a shipment/mailing message
<para />
Carrier object for ShipmentMessageBlockEntity.
Services for the ShipmentMessageBlockEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMarketingAgent">Marketing Agent</see>.

AssociateId.description: The associate that owns this block

Block.description: The block definition. Normally this will be a json structure

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Marketing.description: GetUserBlocks: Get the saved user blocks to be used in a shipment/mailing message

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ShipmentMessage.description:
A shipment message, that contains the actual message being sent out in a mailing
<para />
Carrier object for ShipmentMessageEntity.
Services for the ShipmentMessageEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMarketingAgent">Marketing Agent</see>.

PlainMessage.description: Plain message text of this message

HtmlMessage.description: HTML formatted text of this message

Subject.description: The mail subject field of the message

FolderId.description: The folder which this message belongs to. -1 indicates that the message is on the root

HeaderField.description: Extra header fields added to mail. Must be formatted correctly

Design.description: Will contain the design part of a message. The format will vary based on the type of designer used to create the message

Designtype.description: Enum containing the type of the design

Flags.description: Identifies if HTML or plain message is included in message.

LongDescription.description: A field for a long description of this template

DocumentMessage.description: The SM document used as template for this mailing

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Marketing.description: RenameMailingByMessageId: Change the mailing name (shipment description) that the given message (MessageId) belongs to
DeleteMessageAndShipment: Delete the message and the shipment the message (MessageId) belongs to

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
